General.Name: Leenos Corp
General.Description: Leenos Corp. primarily operates in the fashion and IT businesses in South Korea. It imports and sells casual bags under the Kipling and Eastpak brands. The company also offers system integration solutions, such as system construction, IT consulting, and integrated maintenance services; IT solutions, including integrated control solutions, intelligent transport systems, security solutions, network blackbox, and Internet of Things; and IT services comprising financial IT and radio communication services. In addition, it engages in the production of broadcasting dramas and movies. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
